content: {"name": "Salvation Army Hickory", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A hot meal can make a world of difference to someone that is struggling with food insecurity or homelessness.  We serve dinner to the community every day from 3:30-4:30 at 740 3rd Ave. Pl., Hickory, NC 28602.", "email": "", "url": "https://southernusa.salvationarmy.org/hickory/hunger/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "750 3rd Avenue Place Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Hickory", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28602", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.7264081, "longitude": -81.323945}, "phones": [{"number": "(828) 322-8061", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}]}
